long_description: With a powerful magnification range of 10x to 30x, this waterproof, compact REI monocular pulls in distant objects for easy viewing and fits easily in a pack or pocket. Zoom out to a wide-angle 10x for a large field of view; zoom in to 30x for an up-close, detailed look. Multicoated optics help ensure bright, clear images. Composite and grippy rubber body stands up to knocks and bumps; waterproof design seals out moisture. Fold-down eye cup accommodates use with glasses. Includes soft case, neck strap and lens cleaning cloth.
short_description: With a powerful magnification range of 10x to 30x, this waterproof, compact REI monocular pulls in distant objects for easy viewing and fits easily in a pack or pocket.
